doc.title: Dexter's Rude Removal
doc.plot: Dexter feels that DeeDee's rudeness is becoming a restriction, so he decides to use a device on her than renders her polite and charming, however, the device goes awry, and it separates Dee-Dee into a good polite half and a bad rude half. The rude half swears and does other bad things and Dexter must fix DeeDee before the rude half does something really bad.
